data.title: Web Access to Utah County Land Records
data.text:
Property Searches

Name Search

Search Property Records by Owner Name

Address Search

Search Property Records by Property Location Address

Serial Number Search

Search Property Records by Utah County Parcel Serial Number

Property Information

Display a Property Record by the Parcel Serial Number

Development/Subdivision Search

Search Property Parcel Records by Subdivision or Development Name

Appraisal Information

Select & Display Property Appraisal Information by Serial Number

Property Values

Display Property Values for a Serial Number

Property Valuation

Display Property Valuation Notice Information

Tax Information

Display Property Tax History & Detail

Delinquent Tax Search

Search Delinquent tax records by Owner Name

Tax Payoff

Display Property Tax Payoff Information

Serial History

Display Property Serial Number History

Map Searches

Parcel Map

Display Parcel Image Information

Property Notification Map

Utah County Maps Android Application

Utah County Maps iPad Application

View County's topographic base map. Retrieve assessment info, tax values, title abstract, etc.

Document Searches

Abstract Information

Display documents Recorded for a Property

Document Recording Search

Search Recorder's Office Document Recordings by Entry # or Recording Date

Documents

Display Recorded Document by Entry # or BooK & Page

Document/Parcel Cross-Reference Search

Search Recorded Documents by Document Entry # or Parcel Serial #

Entry Record Search

Search Recorded documents/Parties in Entry # order

Documents by Name

Search Recorded Documents by Name

KOI Search

Search Recorded Document by Document Type (KOI - Kind of Instrument)

Document Description Search (Interim Abstract)

Search Recorded Documents by Description/Location

Last Abstract Information

Display the location of the Document Abstract process

Mining Documents Search

Search and display documents pertaining to mining

Water Rights Documents Search

Search and display documents pertaining to water rights

Document Images

Document Image Display

Display Document Images for an Entry Number and Year

REDI Book (1976-1977)

By Section

By City

Mining Index

Mining Abstract

Typed Abstracts

Recorder Abstract Book Images

Recorder 2016 Plat Map Images

Recorder Plat Map Images
